thread.title: Jana Na Dil Se Door Takes 4 Years Leap; Post Leap Vividha Is Seen With Her Son Madhav! (PICS)
thread.title_full: Jana Na Dil Se Door Takes 4 Years Leap; Post Leap Vividha Is Seen With Her Son Madhav! (PICS)

title: Jana Na Dil Se Door Takes 4 Years Leap; Post Leap Vividha Is Seen With Her Son Madhav! (PICS)
text:
News » Jana Na Dil Se Door Takes 4 Years Leap; Post Leap Vividha Is Seen With Her Son Madhav! (PICS) Jana Na Dil Se Door Takes 4 Years Leap; Post Leap Vividha Is Seen With Her Son Madhav! (PICS) Star Plus’ popular show Jana Na Dil Se Door takes 4 years leap. Post Leap, Vividha is seen with her son, Madhav. Check out Vividha and Atharv’s new looks. Also, read what Yash Patnaik has to say... Published:   17:55   
Jana Na Dil Se Door has never failed to impress the audiences. Even though the show is aired at 5.30 pm time slot and has not made it to the TRP charts, the show has managed to grab the audiences' attention because of its unpredictable twists.We had recently reported about the upcoming leap on the show. Finally, the show has taken four years leap and the lead actress Vividha ( Shivani Surve ) is seen with her son Madhav! Check out Vividha and Atharv's new looks & also, read on to know what Yash Patnaik has to say about the leap... Why The Leap? 
Yash was quoted by a leading daily as saying, "It was a natural progression. With this leap, audience will see the change of dynamics between Atharva, Vividha and Ravish." No Casting Change 
"There are a lot in store for audience with this leap. And also only a four years leap because It's not a casting change leap. The idea is not to infuse new faces." Leap To Explore Relationship Deeper 
"This is a story leap to explore relationships deeper. Four years is not much for a leap yet four years can bring in a sea change in relationships." Jana Na Dil Se Door Success 
"I was always sure about the content of Jana Na Dil Se Door. Good content will work anywhere. Time slots are not in our hands, but content is. We did extremely well at a repeat at 10.30 despite having original at 5.30." Praises Cast & Crew 
"1.5 rating at a repeat slot at 10.30 with a time spent of 14-15 mins is quite commendable. The entire cast and crew deserve a lot of applause for this tremendous job." About Twists 
"Jana Na Dil Se Door is based in the heartland of India. The characters are very rooted. The drama and plots are massy. Relationships are very real. We have also added a thrillerish tone to the narrative to add some extra spice." More To Explore 
"The story has a lot to explore. We have a brilliant team behind the show which is led by Prateek Sharma, Mrinal Jha, Shilpa, Sunjiv Puri and Mamta driving it. We hope audience keeps loving and supporting the show. That's our biggest motivation." Yash Says… 
"There is no fun without ambition and passion. Every project we embark on is exciting for us. We don't go on rampage collecting shows. We put that extra in every project and take it as it comes." Yash Concludes… 
"Every project needs involvement of producers and the core team. One needs to design and execute a new vision to every new show. We value every audience who are watching the show. And the result has been very satisfying." Story So Far.... In the previous episode, Atharv believes his false medical reports. He informs Sujatha and leaves Vividha. Initially, he faked his memory loss, later when he got to know that Vividha loves him immensely and will not leave him, he takes this extreme step.Going by his fake medical reports, he thought he would die early and Vividha might not live happily with him. He wanted her to lead a happy life with Ravish as he loved her the most. So, he leaves Vividha in matap who was waiting for him.But, on the way, he meets a doctor, who with the help of his friend confirms that Atharv is fine. Atharv rushes to Vashisht house. But, by then it would be late, as Vividha loses her hope on her love.Vividha feels that Atharv has betrayed her. Atharv would have promised her that he will love her until his last breath, but she thought he felt she loved Ravish and not him. Suman also condemn Atharva for deceiving them.While on his way, Atharv meets with an accident. He even tries to call Vividha, but in vain. Later, he calls Sujatha, who asks Vividha to stop the marriage. Sujatha stops the marriage.Well, it has to be seen if Atharv manages to get back to Vividha or Ravish marries her.Stay locked to this space for the latest updates of the show....
